snippet.title: Lucid Soul Underwater
snippet.description:
IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT:
  With plans for Kickstarter shortly, there will be an Art contest for Bromides of the main characters... equippable skins that change the powers of a given character and may also change their attack/skill/dragon power visuals. The Tier reward for Bromide Creator will be given to no less than 3 winners voted for by the community and artists of the game. The reward tier right now is valued at $750, and we welcome artists of ALL SKILL LEVELS for this!!! In-game the actual Bromide will range from child drawing to adult drawing, so don't hesitate to enter regardless of quality of work! Details will be provided on the next update of the website: https://lucidsoulgame.com 

  Dive into the oceans of Lucid Soul, a pre-alpha taste of what swimming underwater will be like during certain events in the kingdom of Hecuba, the Drowned Goddess. The race of Aquamazons are highlighted, showcasing their swimming motions, an all-female sea creature with the body of a female and the hair of marine life and a large fish tail. Next update will include the Battle System visuals.
